attributes.additional_details: I think it is entirely unfair for public sector workers to be abused in this way.  They do not have a voice to speak up for them and they only recently came out from under prevented pay rises, during the period of austerity and I think its a bit rich when parliament are shortly to declare obscene pay rises for themselves
attributes.background: We feel that the government should not impact the salaries of public sector workers, to plug the financial hole caused by the pandemic, but should rather consider suspending or reducing foreign aid for a period of time, to balance the books
